text:
Micro Syntax <== Ohm-JS.

Ohm is a Child of PEG.  IMO PEG is about Parser Theory instead of Language Theory. PEG allows thought patterns that are strictly verbotten by Language Theory, e.g. nesting, phrases, identifiers containing whitespace, etc. (which lead to off-the-wall thoughts like gradual code transpilation (‚Äúverbatims‚Äù), multiple identifiers for the same slot, etc.)...
